name: Super Hero Bike Mega Ramp 2
description:
Do you love Superheroes?? Are you ready to grab some powers & play on bikes?? Yes, We MT Free Games are back with amazing unique upgraded features for our lovely users in Super Hero Bike Mega Ramp 2. Hey, superhero fans there are unique superheroes with their unique superpowers. Want to try all the superheroes in this game??? Just download & start your free game of super racing action gameplay & play-style that suits you best.. It’s a crazy game with new freestyle stunts & different task to play. Grab your favorite bike and show off your moves on the mega ramp. You will have tasks once you reach the city like help your co- superheroes, fight crimes, collect cash, missions etc. The superpowers are ready for their tasks! Are you ready to join the force with them?? Don’t miss it!!! Share the status with your friends on the social website & compete with them.
Yayy!!! It's a free superhero challenging game!!!!
HOW TO PLAY:

* Get on to your crazy bike & ride on mega ramps to perform stunts.
* Drive into the unique obstacles & arrive in the city to perform your task.
* You will have the task to complete the levels in the city.

Get ready to download & play Super Hero Bike Mega Ramp 2 Game!

Super Hero Bike Mega Ramp 2 features:

• It's a Free Racing Game with stunts & tasks.
• Amazing action fun game on bikes.
• Complete challenges and earn rewards.
• Enjoy 12 unique sporty racing bikes.
• Unlock & Play 12+ Levels
• Upbeat background music and sound effects.
• Fun, addictive gameplay to race with your favourite hero.
• Incremental difficulties from one level to the next level.
• Amazing unique superheroes
• Unique crazy superheroes with unique superpowers.
• Get coins as rewards to unlock super bikes.
• Rank up and share your rank to friends on Social Media.


Do you like this Super Hero Bike Mega Ramp 2?? Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback. It will mean the world for us!

CHANNEL & VIDEOS:

You can subscribe us on our YOUTUBE Channel for updates & new game notifications!!!!
YOUTUBE:- https://www.youtube.com/bigcodegames
